EmailTemplate.name: 17-BG-SSE-Email-SSE CSD prod nurture-T00241.SSE_CSD_4_ART_White_Paper
EmailTemplate.subject: Writing your own rules for 4G LTE Diameter Signaling
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> White Paper Discover Agile Rules Technology (ART) In a rapidly changing industry, you face many challenges that force you to react quickly to competitive threats and implement new business models, while further reducing operational complexity and cost. To address those challenges, you rely on telecoms software solutions. And along with databases and analytics engines, rules engines are a key element of many IT systems.
In this white paper, learn about rules engine types, including general purpose rules engine, hard-coded rules engine, and Nokia’s Agile Rules Technology (ART) – software backed by over 150 patents, which allows you to easily write your own rules for 4G LTE’s Diameter signaling. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
